name: Frog Halloween
description:
Frog Halloween is a simple, Halloween-themed 2D game made during the 2020 Bit Project Gameathon. Play as a small, green frog and jump to dodge the obstacles to win!

The song featured in this game is “Skeleton Waltz Theme" by Wolfgang, available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license.

Bit Project link: https://www.bitproject.org/

This game was made using GameMaker Studio 2.
